page.title: 04A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: { My day starts at 7-15 when I have to get up.I eat my breakfast and read the paper. After breakfast I get dressed and washed. When my bag is ready I go to school. We have an assembly about the life boats and then we go back to class. The first break has gone so we go out to play. After play we do some more work until the lunch break.I stayed in to do my picture of the lake.When the bell goes again everyone comes into class and starts to work until the last break bell goes and then we all go out to play.There are crisps and drinks being sold.Sir says,after play,that we would have cricket but Rebbeca and I were doing a collage so we stayed in to do that. At 3.15 they returned,changed,put up our chairs,when the bell went we all went happily home.
